contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|SPAM|Spam|spam|spammy}} {{selfref|For spam on Wikipedia, see [[Wikipedia:Spam]] and [[Wikipedia:WikiProject Spam]]}} '''[[Spam]]''' is a canned pork meat product. '''Spam''' or '''SPAM''' may also refer to: * [[Spam (electronic)]], unsolicited or undesired electronic messages, named after the Monty Python sketch ** [[Email spam]], unsolicited, undesired, or illegal email messages * [[Spam (gaming)]], the repetition of an in-game action * [[Spam (Monty Python)|"Spam" (Monty Python)]], a comedy sketch about the meat * [[Street spam]], flyposting, an analogous illegal blanket advertising in public places ==Other uses== * "Spam", a song about the meat by "Weird Al" Yankovic on the album ''[[UHF â€“ Original Motion Picture Soundtrack and Other Stuff]]'' * "Spam", a track about the meat on ''[[It Means Everything]]'', 1997 ska album by Save Ferris * Smooth-particle applied mechanics, the use of [[smoothed-particle hydrodynamics]] computation to study impact fractures in solids {{disambig}}
